statements: SELECT * FROM service_tickets;
SELECT customer_name, status FROM service_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM service_tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT * FROM service_tickets WHERE resolution_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, status, resolution_details FROM service_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_tickets WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM service_tickets WHERE resolution_details IS NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status FROM service_tickets WHERE status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolution_details FROM service_tickets WHERE status = 'Closed' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS ticket_count FROM service_tickets GROUP BY customer_name HAVING ticket_count > 1;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM service_tickets;
SELECT * FROM service_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, update_description, update_time FROM service_tickets JOIN ticket_updates ON service_tickets.ticket_id = ticket_updates.ticket_id;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, status FROM service_tickets WHERE resolution_details IS NULL;

SELECT customer_name, update_description, update_time FROM service_tickets JOIN ticket_updates ON service_tickets.ticket_id = ticket_updates.ticket_id WHERE ticket_updates.update_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT * FROM service_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM service_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description, status FROM service_tickets WHERE status = 'Closed' AND customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM service_tickets JOIN ticket_updates ON service_tickets.ticket_id = ticket_updates.ticket_id WHERE ticket_updates.updated_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, update_description, update_time FROM service_tickets INNER JOIN ticket_updates ON service_tickets.ticket_id = ticket_updates.ticket_id ORDER BY update_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT resolution_id, technician_name FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_notes LIKE '%resolved%';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE status IN ('Pending', 'Processing');
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_details FROM tickets WHERE resolution_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolution_details FROM tickets WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND issue_description IS NOT NULL;

SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, update_time, update_description FROM tickets JOIN status_updates ON tickets.ticket_id = status_updates.ticket_id WHERE tickets.status = 'Pending' ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT technician_name, resolution_notes FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_id > 100 ORDER BY resolution_id ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, resolution_notes FROM tickets JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id WHERE resolution_notes LIKE '%solved%' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Issue;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description, status FROM Issue WHERE status='Open';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE contact_number='123456789';
SELECT resolution_details, resolved_by FROM Resolution ORDER BY resolved_at DESC;
SELECT issue_id, update_description, updated_by FROM Status_Update WHERE updated_at >= '2021-09-01';
SELECT * FROM Issue WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT resolution_details, resolved_by FROM Resolution WHERE resolution_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_number FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description, status, created_at FROM Issue LEFT JOIN Status_Update ON Issue.issue_id = Status_Update.issue_id WHERE update_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING ticket_count > 2;
SELECT update_id, update_description, update_date FROM ticket_updates ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, email, issue_description FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id;
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.issue_description, tu.update_description, tu.update_date FROM tickets t JOIN ticket_updates tu ON t.ticket_id = tu.ticket_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, t.issue_description, s.status_name FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN statuses s ON t.status = s.status_name;
